title: Antique gray plank style wood flooring throughout Living Spaces
posting_body: ['Sapphire Bay', '99 W Cedar Bayou Lynchburg', 'Rd, Baytown, TX, 77521', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 11', 'OR Text', '11', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'WELCOME TO SAPPHIRE BAY', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 856 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Sapphire Bay lies just thirty minutes from downtown Houston and offers spacious apartments, ultramodern amenities, and unparalleled convenience.', 'Located in charming Baytown, Texas, Sapphire Bay features generously spaced one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans and state-of-the-art home amenities like plank-style wood flooring, large closets, and beautifully oversized terraces.', 'For recreation and leisure, community amenities are just as enticing and include a lounge pool with in-water tanning deck, outdoor kitchen with grilling stations, expansive dog park with puppy pool, and much more.', 'Unlike most Baytown apartments, Sapphire Bay also offers both garage and lot parking for over-sized vehicles.', 'We invite you to relax completely within our luxury apartments in Baytown, TX.', 'Whether you are searching for suburban charm or an alternative to nearby Houston apartments, discover your new home at Sapphire Bay.', 'Features', '- Oversize side-by-side Whirlpool refrigerator with water and ice dispenser', '- Whirlpool Stainless Steel appliances', '- Cut Berber carpet in Bedrooms', '- Large walk-in closets', '- Ceiling fans with overhead lighting in Living Room and Bedrooms', '- Antique gray plank style wood flooring throughout Living Spaces', '- Sleek white subway tile backsplash', '- Custom 42" smooth gray kitchen cabinetry', '- Grey-Mist granite counter-tops in Kitchen and Bathrooms', '- Single basin kitchen sink with goose-neck faucet and sprayer', '- 2" faux wood blinds', '*Please note: an asterisk * denotes that some amenities are only available in select units.', 'Community Amenities', '- Private attached and separate garages*', '- Extended size garages and reserved parking for large vehicles available', '- Business Center with PC and Mac station', '- 24-hour yoga and spin studio with Fitness On-Demand technology', '- Pet grooming station', '- Luxury lounge pool with in-water tanning deck', '- 24-hour resident package lockers', '- Private yards on select units', '- Courtyard fire pits with outdoor seating', '- Covered parking options*', '- Outdoor kitchen with gas and charcoal grilling stations', '- Clubhouse with large kitchen for entertaining', '- Limited access gated community with remote access', '- 24-hour fully equipped fitness center with top-of-the-line Precor fitness equipment', '- Private poolside cabanas', '- Direct access attached garages in select units', '- Expansive dog park with puppy pool', '- On-Site 24-hour emergency maintenance', '- On-Site management', 'Driving Directions', '99 W Cedar Bayou Lynchburg', 'Rd, Baytown, TX 77521', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs allowed up to 60lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'mtgO61TonC7F']
